properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
NAMIBIA.
DNC 01.
VESSEL KRAKEN, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, TAKING ON
WATER IN 20-34.4S 010-17.9E AT 051200Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
PHONE: 272 1938 3300, 272 1551 2617,
E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA,
MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
